hoursAgo.description: Content was posted more than 1 hour ago and less than 1 day ago

minutesAgo.description: Content was posted more than 1 minute ago and less than 60 minutes ago

monthDayFormat.description: Date format with day and month abbreviation

monthDayYearFormat.description: Date format with day, month abbreviation, and year

monthNames.default: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December

monthNamesAbbrev.default: Jan, Feb, Mar, Apr, May, Jun, Jul, Aug, Sep, Oct, Nov, Dec

secondsAgo.description: Content was posted more than 1 second ago and less than 60 seconds ago
